attributes.additional_details: The Government/Parliament Should do this so adults and children can rest, this could also be used to help with mental health.
attributes.background: Make Monday A weekend, Let's people relax on Monday and no work is done, Children can make new friends online and outside.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about when people work are a matter for individuals and their employers, not the UK Government or Parliament. We could accept a petition calling on the Government to require schools make Monday part of the school weekend, if that's something you want to happen.
